scripts.update: yarn install && yarn update-backend && yarn update-frontend
scripts.setup: yarn update && git remote add joaolopes-backend https://git.heroku.com/joaolopes-backend-prod.git && git remote add joaolopes-frontend https://git.heroku.com/joaolopes-prod.git
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.commit-backend: git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "backend deploy" && git push origin master
scripts.commit-frontend: git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "frontend deploy" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy-backend: yarn build-backend && yarn commit-backend && git push joaolopes-backend `git subtree split --prefix backend master`:master --force
scripts.deploy-frontend: yarn build-frontend && yarn commit-frontend && git push joaolopes-frontend `git subtree split --prefix frontend master`:master --force
